about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Hyderabad based S.S. Infrastructure Development Consultants Private Limited is engaged in the business of Engineering Consultancy and is an Integrated Infrastructure Development solution provider in India. The Company provides Architectural Planning, Comprehensive Civil/Structural designs, Project Management Consultancy, Repairs and Rehabilitation, Quality Management Systems through well-qualified teams and experienced promoters.

S.S Infrastructure mainly participates in the tenders floated by the Government authorities, Corporate establishments and other business entities. It has executed large projects for organizations like Cyient Limited (formerly known as
Infotech Enterprises Limited), Granules India Limited and Government Organizations.

The strengths of the company are-

1. Expertise in structural designing
consulting services.
2. Vintage with the Defense and other
organization
3. High-Value Order book
4. Experienced Management Team,
Promoters and Board of Directors

The company has 115 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the S.S. Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer:
S.S. Infrastructure IPO is a SME IPO of 4278000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹17.11 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 28, 2018, and closes on April 5, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in S.S. Infrastructure IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in S.S. Infrastructure IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in S.S. Infrastructure IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in S.S. Infrastructure IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'S.S. Infrastructure IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When S.S. Infrastructure IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The S.S. Infrastructure IPO opens on March 28, 2018 and closes on April 5, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of S.S. Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer: S.S. Infrastructure IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for S.S. Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in S.S. Infrastructure IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is S.S. Infrastructure IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for S.S. Infrastructure IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 10, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, April 12, 2018. Check the S.S. Infrastructure IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is S.S. Infrastructure IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The S.S. Infrastructure IPO listing date is on Thursday, April 12, 2018.
